column1: #Text=Zhao says : " It 's my destiny , to destroy the moon and the Water Tribe . "
#Text=Aang says : " Destroying the moon wo n't hurt just the Water Tribe .
#Text=" Zhao says : " General Iroh , why am I not surprised to discover your treachery ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm no traitor , Zhao , the Fire Nation needs the moon , too ; we all depend on the balance .
#Text=Whatever you do to that spirit I 'll unleash on you ten-fold .
#Text=" Yue says : " There 's no hope now , it 's over .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , it 's not over .
